u_rle.c

00002 /*
00003  *     xDMS  v1.3  -  Portable DMS archive unpacker  -  Public Domain
00004  *     Written by     Andre Rodrigues de la Rocha  <adlroc@usa.net>
00005  *
00006  *     Run Length Encoding decompression function used in most
00007  *     modes after decompression by other algorithm
00008  *
00009  */
00010 
00011 #include <string.h>
00012 #include "cdata.h"
00013 #include "u_rle.h"
00014 
00015 
00016 
00017 USHORT Unpack_RLE(UCHAR *in, UCHAR *out, USHORT origsize){
00018     USHORT n;
00019     UCHAR a,b, *outend;
00020 
00021     outend = out+origsize;
00022     while (out<outend){
00023         if ((a = *in++) != 0x90)
00024             *out++ = a;
00025         else if (!(b = *in++))
00026             *out++ = a;
00027         else {
00028             a = *in++;
00029             if (b == 0xff) {
00030                 n = *in++;
00031                 n = (USHORT)((n<<8) + *in++);
00032             } else
00033                 n = b;
00034             if (out+n > outend) return 1;
00035             memset(out,a,(size_t) n);
00036             out += n;
00037         }
00038     }
00039     return 0;
00040 }
